name: Village Maker - Browser Version
description:
This is a small experimental app created to test modular architectural elements and runtime material editing.

This is a test for my new project, a city-building/strategy game featuring customizable, modular units and buildings.

If you're interested in my projects, please visit my patreon: https://patreon.com/lexferreira89

There's also a Windows version available, with higher quality graphics: https://lexferreira89.itch.io/village-maker-windows-version

3D assets and code all made by me.
Placeholder textures made by https://3dtextures.me/
3D made in Blender. Game developed in Godot.

Source code and 3D models available at:

https://patreon.com/lexferreira89

https://gumroad.com/lexferreira89

Made by LexFerreira89 - September 2020

Placeholder textures by 3dtextures.me
